name: Mushroom Field
description:
You're a fairy that lives in a mushroom field. Your world's divided into 4 parts: The Mushroom Field, The Celestial Village, The Void Staircases and The Darkest Ruins. 

In the ruins, a silly-looking, but evil, creature plans to destroy the other parts of this world. Since you're the only one that knows about it, you're the one that has to destroy it.

Thanks to my friend that drew the drawing that inspired this game!
